meta_text: S KYI MTHA' DPYOD DANG BCAS TE RGYAS PAR STZAL SKABS, GZHUNG GI TSIG ZIN LA MI GSAL BA'I GSUNG BSHAD PHAL MO CHE'I ZIN BRIS BDE LAM YANG GSAL SGRON ME_The Lamp that Sheds Even More Light upon the ‘Path to Bliss’— Notes on the Majority of a Teaching, upon Unclear Parts of the Wording of the Root Text, granted in the Fire Bird Year [1777] by that Being who is, in His Essence, the Lord of the Secret World, the Warrior of Diamond Himself, King of the Dharma, His Holiness the Panchen Lama, to that One God of the Land of Snows, the Holder of the Lotus, Masquerading in the Golden Robes, Lord of All the Victorious Buddhas, the Great and Omniscient All_PAN CHEN BLA MA SKU PHRENG GSUM PA DPAL LDAN YE SHES (1738-1780)
